name: You are Never Alone
description:
Lost in a nightmarish maze that is oddly familiar, you must remember how to escape without them finding you. Be careful though, "they" have unique powers and if you don't find all your memories, they will follow you to the outside.

The only exit is closed. You must collect enough Memories for it to open, even when it is opened, you may need more to survive.
Two different endings based on the players ability to find what they need.
Based on the mindset of a character from 'Hidden Life.'

Created by Jason Hanes.
